name: Jetway Airlines, Inc.
description: Jetway Airlines, Inc. is a rapidly growing regional airline based in the United States, committed to providing exceptional air travel service to underserved markets. Founded in 2010, Jetway Airlines focuses on connecting smaller cities and towns to major metropolitan areas, offering travelers convenient and reliable options for air travel. The airline operates a fleet of modern, fuel-efficient regional jets, ensuring safety and comfort for its passengers. Jetway is known for its customer-centric approach, providing personalized service and flexibility to meet the needs of leisure and business travelers alike. The airline also emphasizes sustainability, implementing practices to reduce its carbon footprint and support environmental initiatives. With a mission to enhance connectivity and foster economic development in the regions it serves, Jetway Airlines is dedicated to delivering high-quality air travel experiences while contributing to the growth of the communities it connects.

seo.meta_title: Jetway Airlines, Inc. | Your Regional Travel Solution
seo.meta_description: Discover Jetway Airlines, Inc., a regional airline committed to connecting underserved markets with major cities. Explore our services, mission, and impact on regional travel.

faq.question: What regions does Jetway Airlines serve?
faq.answer: Jetway Airlines serves a variety of underserved regions across the United States, connecting them to major metropolitan areas.

faq.question: What types of services does Jetway Airlines offer?
faq.answer: Jetway Airlines offers passenger services including Economy and Business Class, as well as cargo services for freight shipping and logistics.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Jetway Airlines?
faq.answer: Jessica Tran is the CEO of Jetway Airlines, Inc.
